taskName.online: You need to make as many words as you can from the given letters. The words should be minimum 3 letters long. You can get 2 points for each word. If you can not find any new words, you can refresh the playing field and continue the game.
taskName.offline: In turns make up words from the given letters. The words should be minimum 3 letters long. You can get 2 points for each word. If you can not find any new words, you can refresh the playing field and continue the game. Each player is given 30 seconds to take a turn.
